refnamediv.refpurpose: Inspect, modify and configure disks and block devices

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: gnome-disks is the disk utility in GNOME. It provides a way to inspect, format, partition and configure disks and block devices.

listitem.para: Switches to the Disks application and selects the block device given by the DEVICE paramter (for example, /dev/sda). If the Disks application is not running it will be launched (and the command invocation will block until the application exits), otherwise the existing instance will be used (and the command will exit immediately).
Prints and short help text and exits.
